attributes.action: Let Clare Lomas have a London Marathon Medal
attributes.additional_details:
Clare Lomas is bravely completing the London Marathon following paralysis after a horse riding accident. Organisers of the Virgin London Marathon are refusing to give Clare a medal, as she won't finish within 24 hours - a newly introduced rule.

We, the undersigned, ask that the rules be relaxed in certain circumstances in order that disabled people have equal right to not only finish the marathon, but to receive a finishers medal.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Marathon Ltd.
